name: AdultCriticalCareEvaluationAndManagementServicesCPT
title: Adult Critical Care Evaluation and Management Services (CPT)
description: This value set includes CPT concepts for adult critical care services.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set includes CPT concepts for adult critical care services.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients receiving critical care services. This element may map to the "Encounter " Category of the Quality Data Model.),(Inclusion Criteria: Critical care billing codes for services provided during pre-specified initial period of time,  and for each additional period of time for which additional billing is allowed.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts for neonatal critical care services.)

concept.display: Critical care, evaluation and management of the critically ill or critically injured patient; first 30-74 minutes
Critical care, evaluation and management of the critically ill or critically injured patient; each additional 30 minutes (List separately in addition to code for primary service)

contains.display: Critical care, evaluation and management of the critically ill or critically injured patient; first 30-74 minutes
Critical care, evaluation and management of the critically ill or critically injured patient; each additional 30 minutes (List separately in addition to code for primary service)
